users.name: zukunft.com system
users.description: the internal zukunft.com system user mainly used as a log entry for the initial setup and batch jobs

users.name: zukunft.com admin
users.description: the fallback zukunft.com admin user that should only be used in a break-glass event to recover other admin users

users.name: zukunft.com system test
users.description: the internal zukunft.com user used for integration tests that should never be shown to the user but is used to check if integration test data is completely removed after the tests

users.name: zukunft.com system test partner
users.description: another internal zukunft.com user used for user sandbox integration tests that should never be shown to the user but is used to check if integration test data is completely removed after the tests

users.name: zukunft.com system test partner
users.description: another internal zukunft.com user used for user sandbox integration tests that should never be shown to the user but is used to check if integration test data is completely removed after the tests
